name: Dead Shop - Open For Business
description:
Dead Shop - Open For Business

You have been summoned to aid Vending Machine-Sama. You must PROTECT the sacred CAN OF BEANS! W,A,S,D To Move Walk Into Vending Machine Shadow For Shopping Window.

Here is the can! KILL ALL THE BEAN EATERS!!!

P.S. Kill enough zombies & Taxi-chan will take you home.

Made for the Vim Jam 3 Game Jam

The Focus Multi-use is in the main vending Machine.

  1. The machine heals the player
  2. It dispenses upgrades
  3. It creates a pocket of safety from the zombies

For the theme Turn Up The Heat the game does the following

  1. Zombies speed increase over time.
  2. Zombies spawn rate increase over time.

Assets Used

  • Art - https://www.kenney.nl/
    • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-shmup
    • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/rpg-urban-pack
    • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-ui-pack
  • Music - https://opengameart.org/content/royalty-free-game-music-loops

Tools Used 

  • Godot
  • Gimp
  • Aseprite
  • rFXGen

Helpers!

  • Vending Machine Dialog - My Friend [NorthernFist]
